body.p: Optional SPDs are available in 100kA or 200 kA surge capacity (per phase) for both input and output (). The standard Mersen SPD has a colored end-of-life status light for each phase where green = OK and Not lit = Replace Unit. Lights are viewable through a window in the front door, but installation location varies according to PDU design.

Mersen SPDs also have a Form C dry contact for signaling status. The dry contact is terminated at a terminal block located close to the SPD and is not pre-wired to any detection or alarm sensing circuits. The contacts are available for customer use.
SPDs report status differently by vendor and model. For other vendors, check vendor specifications and consult the factory. SPD Status Lights and Dry Contact Connections (Mersen)
